name: Thinking Hut IT Solutions Pvt. ltd.
description:
My name is Brijesh and I represent Thinking Hut IT Solutions (www.thinkinghut.com) , a young start up based out of Pune, India (Development centre) and San Jose, USA (Sales office). 
We have done multiple websites using PHP technology and MVC framework for various clients based out of AUS, USA and UK. We have good experience using various framework like MVC 3, 3.5 and 4.0, Spring, Yii and Zend. 
We have expertise in .Net, Java, JavaScript, Backbone, HTML5, MySQL & PHP in terms of core technologies and packaged apps like Joomla, Drupal, Word press, nopCommerce & dotNetNuke. We have done multiple cloud deployments on Azure and Google App Engine.
READ MORE...
